about_the_game:
Welcome to Corner Loot!

Corner Loot is a clicker game that runs discreetly in the corner of your desktop, letting you loot chests, gather treasure, and progress without interrupting your activities. It’s perfect for enjoying while you work, study, or browse the web—you’ll always have something new waiting, without the game getting in the way… unless the loot is too epic to ignore!

Key Features:

  • Doesn’t interfere with your workflow: The game stays tucked away in its corner, making sure it doesn’t invade your screen while you’re working or browsing. Productivity stays on track, but the loot keeps coming! It’s like a hidden treasure—no walls to break, just riches to collect.

  • Optional windowed mode: If you prefer a more traditional experience, you can switch to windowed mode and let Corner Loot take center stage… though with all that gold, we can’t promise you’ll want to go back to work anytime soon!

  • Loot while you type: Want your keyboard to do more than just write emails? Set up the game to detect keystrokes and collect loot with every word you type. Your keyboard has never been so rewarding!

  • Progress through dungeons: Explore various dungeons, each filled with unique chests waiting to be looted. As you advance through each level, you’ll reach the final dungeon chest, which contains special rewards. Along the way, you’ll find gear that boosts your chest-opening skills, increases your speed, and enhances your effectiveness. Each upgrade brings you closer to even greater riches!

  • Idle gameplay and automation: If you prefer a more laid-back approach, Corner Loot lets you automate the looting process. With special tools like lockpicks, you can set the game to open chests automatically while you focus on other tasks. Even when you’re not clicking, the treasure keeps flowing without interruption.

Corner Loot is perfect for those seeking a light, distraction-free gaming experience. Loot at your own pace while you tackle other things, and you never know when that chest in the corner will drop something that makes you forget all about work… at least for a little while.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Compatible with both Intel and Apple Silicon (M1 and later)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or a graphics card with 512 MB of VRAM compatible with DirectX 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
